text: Action in the North Atlantic (also known as Heroes Without Uniforms) is a 1943 American World War II drama movie directed by Lloyd Bacon and starring Humphrey Bogart, Raymond Massey, Ruth Gordon, Alan Hale Sr., Julie Bishop, Sam Levene, Dane Clark, Peter Whitney. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1944. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 drama movies Category:1943 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:Movies about Nazi Germany Category:World War II movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Lloyd Bacon Category:Movies directed by Byron Haskin
title: Action in the North Atlantic
